./external/basejump_stl/bsg_mem/bsg_mem_1rw_sync_mask_write_byte.v Cov: 87.2% 

   1: module bsg_mem_1rw_sync_mask_write_byte #( parameter els_p = -1
   2:                                           ,parameter addr_width_lp = `BSG_SAFE_CLOG2(els_p)
   3: 
   4:                                           ,parameter data_width_p = -1
   5:                                           ,parameter latch_last_read_p=0
   6:                                           ,parameter write_mask_width_lp = data_width_p>>3
   7:                                           ,parameter enable_clock_gating_p=0
   8:                                          )
   9:   ( input clk_i
  10:    ,input reset_i
  11: 
  12:    ,input v_i
  13:    ,input w_i
  14: 
  15:    ,input [addr_width_lp-1:0]       addr_i
  16:    ,input [data_width_p-1:0]        data_i
  17:     // for each bit set in the mask, a byte is written
  18:    ,input [write_mask_width_lp-1:0] write_mask_i
  19: 
  20:    ,output logic [data_width_p-1:0] data_o
  21:   );
  22: 
  23:    wire clk_lo;
  24: 
  25:    if (enable_clock_gating_p)
  26:      begin
  27:        bsg_clkgate_optional icg
  28:          (.clk_i( clk_i )
  29:          ,.en_i( v_i )
  30:          ,.bypass_i( 1'b0 )
  31:          ,.gated_clock_o( clk_lo )
  32:          );
  33:      end
  34:    else
  35:      begin
  36:        assign clk_lo = clk_i;
  37:      end
  38: 
  39:    bsg_mem_1rw_sync_mask_write_byte_synth
  40:      #(.els_p(els_p), .data_width_p(data_width_p), .latch_last_read_p(latch_last_read_p))
  41:    synth
  42:    (.clk_i(clk_lo)
  43:    ,.reset_i
  44:    ,.v_i
  45:    ,.w_i
  46:    ,.addr_i
  47:    ,.data_i
  48:    ,.write_mask_i
  49:    ,.data_o
  50:    );
  51: 
  52:   // synopsys translate_off
  53: 
  54:   always_comb
  55:     assert (data_width_p % 8 == 0)
  56:       else $error("data width should be a multiple of 8 for byte masking");
  57: 
  58:    initial
  59:      begin
  60:         $display("## %L: instantiating data_width_p=%d, els_p=%d (%m)",data_width_p,els_p);
  61:      end
  62: 
  63:   // synopsys translate_on
  64: 
  65:    
  66: endmodule
  67:
